column2: to respect, to mind, to watch
to request, to require, to ask
turn on, to put on, to switch on
to clean up, to put away
to turn off, to switch off, to arrange
to choose, to select, to elect
to use, to make use of
to report, to tell, to cover
to order, to reserve, to appoint
to go and see, to visit
to need, to require, to want, to use
to catch, to win, to accompish
to put, to devise, to draft
to ask, to wonder, to query
to cast, to throw, to toss
to crack, to rip, to break
to push, to move, to edge
